name: The Scholar's Study
description: A cozy library filled with ancient books and mysterious artifacts. Perfect for beginners to learn the basics of puzzle solving.

name: The Grand Library
description: A vast library with towering bookshelves and hidden passages. Moderate challenges await those who seek knowledge.

name: The Master's Vault
description: The ultimate challenge - a high-security vault with the most complex puzzles and ingenious traps. Only for the most skilled escape artists.
